column4: The question was really about installing. I have a .BIN "installer" and i don't know what to do with it. Do those links have anything in there?
I'd like to learn how to install things if i can't find them in the manager *anyway* so i really want to do it this way if I can.
http://monkeyblog.org/ubuntu/installing.html#installing_a_package_manually Do a  CTRL+F, type bin, click next til you find what you need. Twas a simple google.
